about_the_game:
The Griffon's Saddlebag Volume 6

By: The Griffon's Saddlebag
These 50 unique niche-filling weapons and items are flavorful, balanced, and ready for you and your players to enjoy. These creative new items are designed to open up new opportunities for roleplay and combat while staying balanced and fun to use at the table.
[h3] Features[/h3] As a Griffon's Saddlebag product, you can expect the following benefits:
  • Low-Prep Setup. Metadata tagging, along with identified and unidentified item handouts, save you hours of prep time.
  • Ledger. All items come listed on a single sheet for ease of access, and includes simple instructions for use.
  • Professional Art. The Griffon's Saddlebag's art bring life to every item with remarkable attention to detail.
  • Fine Attunement. These items have been rigorously reviewed for balance and are fully-ready for use in your games.
[h3] Included items:[/h3] Common
  • Orator's Quill
  • Quicksilver Clay
  • Webgrip Rucksack
Uncommon
  • Barricade Shield
  • Baton of Many Sizes
  • Cactus Mace
  • Couatl Herald's Guard
  • Couatl Herald's Mantle
  • Devil's Detail Eyepatch
  • Galepierce Weapons
  • Mask of the Pact Breaker
  • Tethervine Quiver
  • Thwackstaff
  • Toadstone
  • Venombane Armor
  • Void Arrow
  • Weapon of Spite
Rare
  • Basilisk Dagger
  • Couatl Herald's Fang
  • Couatl Herald's Lash
  • Couatl Herald's Radiance
  • Couatl Herald's Reach
  • Couatl Herald's Scales
  • Fire Wand of the Unbroken Circle
  • Lightning Pylons
  • Runic Ammunition
  • Sandstorm Dancer
  • Spiderbite Daggers
  • Staff of the Mustang
  • Vancian Helm
  • Warmind Wand
Very Rare
  • Astral Bracelet
  • Architect's Disdain
  • Blood Pact Pendants
  • Crosier of Divine Power
  • Crown of Deep Winter
  • Fragment of Elder Starlight
  • Grass Whistle Blade
  • Mirrorlight Piercer
  • Quagmire Maul
  • Shaedenstaff
  • Signet Rings of the Fey Court
  • Snuff
  • Splitter
  • Timepiercer
  • Wildman's Spinning Cleaver
  • Winter's Embrace
Legendary
  • Bloodscryer Oculus
  • Sword of the Spelldrinker
  • Visage of Delight and Disaster
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  Ryan Yingling

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.
detailed_description:
The Griffon's Saddlebag Volume 6

By: The Griffon's Saddlebag
These 50 unique niche-filling weapons and items are flavorful, balanced, and ready for you and your players to enjoy. These creative new items are designed to open up new opportunities for roleplay and combat while staying balanced and fun to use at the table.
[h3] Features[/h3] As a Griffon's Saddlebag product, you can expect the following benefits:
  • Low-Prep Setup. Metadata tagging, along with identified and unidentified item handouts, save you hours of prep time.
  • Ledger. All items come listed on a single sheet for ease of access, and includes simple instructions for use.
  • Professional Art. The Griffon's Saddlebag's art bring life to every item with remarkable attention to detail.
  • Fine Attunement. These items have been rigorously reviewed for balance and are fully-ready for use in your games.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

These creative new items are designed to open up new opportunities for roleplay and combat while staying balanced and fun to use at the table.
